body: Hey, I'm back! If you don't remember me I was "BioNicBhawk"... I changed my name to Bionix cause i like it better... Also I am going to record on Avicus.
body_tagged: Hey, I'm back! If you don't remember me I was "BioNicBhawk"... I changed my name to Bionix cause i like it better... Also I am going to record on Avicus.
title: Hi! Bionix

replies.body: Hello welcome here/back enjoy your stay im looking forward to seeing you around in game ! Also you can join our TS the ip is ts.avicus.net . Also make sure you check out the rules !

replies.body: Hey there dude! I look forward to seeing you around more!

replies.body:
Hey there! I remember you!
In case of an emergency, here are the rules. Read up! They're helpful!

I hope you enjoy your stay in Avicus again :3
